title: SUMO
lyrics:
4 ContributorsSUMO Lyrics[Intro]
Um, yeah, yeah
This is hard still, I like this one
Oh, what? Okay, this one's the one that's trending, yeah?
Aight, cool, cool, um, let me get the other one instead then
Aight, cool, thanks

[Verse 1]
Head over to mine, she wiping her face
Cornrows out, she dashing the lace
Not seen her in days
Can't make her an ex, she down to the bone, she drink it like Wrays
Back then crime pays, posting pics Snapchat days (Yeah)
Used to do mileage, my weekend startеd on Fridays (Yeah)
I'm loving that two piece sеt you got on
Don't follow no trends, I don't hop on (Huh)
Me and them man don't move the same, I'm online before they hop on (Soft)
I'm telling them man, "Just jog on" (Uh)
Use to work on the 'net like dot com
Dot, dot, dot com, a lot has just changed, right from wrong yeah
I'm just not a real big spender
I weren't even tryna offend her
Dinner dates might go on a bender
If she down, I'll go on and bend her
I'm tugging these pieces, Jenga, overseas I ship it like vendor
Take more than a month to render, but it comes in clean, lenger
The jeans stay oversized, the hoodie came oversized, her back came oversized
I'm looking so hypnotised, I'm rubbing my flipping eyes, yeah (Yeah)
I couldn't believe how them man doubted, was never the one they counted (Never)
She didn't believe, I went and just found it
Playing me, telling just sound it
You might also like[Chorus]
If you know I'm into you, what's all this game about? (Huh)
I'm sumo, but uno, I don't chase, I bounce (Yeah)
Come ride in the coupe, be my masseuse, turn this one to two (Come on)
Making you chew, chew, step with me, you'll never snooze
If you know I'm into you, what's all this game about? (Huh)
I'm sumo, but uno, I don't chase, I bounce (Yeah)
Come ride in the coupe, be my masseuse, turn this one to two (Come on)
Making you chew, chew, step with me, you'll never snooze

[Verse 2]
Tropical rhythms, I'm feeling the taste
She see me she moving her waist
Days, it go so quick when you constantly on the chase
Grabbing the loot, I got a bounty
Slow replies, like, babe, just 'llow me (Shit)
When I see her I'm fixing it all, like, she be my cow girl, I'm saying, "Howdy" (Woo)
If she coming pretty petite or thicker than me, come hop in my seat
Glee, I got a singer to me
Yee, this one is out of your reach
Sleep, it don't mean nothin' me, I'm making it work by the end of the week
Cardigans with the cargo's, peak, I'm dashing that fleece, don't rock that please (That please)
Bad B's eating that sushi, cocktail date, she bustin' the coochie
Magnum sippin' on duty (Yeah)
Handy cam when I'm cruising (Woo)
Nobody's perfect, still they wan' judge you, got me thinking like (Fuck you)
Just watch how they on you when your plans work out and it just happen like (I told you)
All that flexing don't really impress me, no (No)
Them man envy, gotta watch how your friends be, oh (Oh)
Don't watch, I just swipe and scroll
Back then use to get pins, no bowl
The money just comes in slow, but it's deeper when I reach the end goal
[Chorus]
If you know I'm into you, what's all this game about? (Huh)
I'm sumo, but uno, I don't chase, I bounce (Yeah)
Come ride in the coupe, be my masseuse, turn this one to two (Come on)
Making you chew, chew, step with me, you'll never snooze
If you know I'm into you, what's all this game about? (Huh)
I'm sumo, but uno, I don't chase, I bounce (Yeah)
Come ride in the coupe, be my masseuse, turn this one to two (Come on)
Making you chew, chew, step with me, you'll never snoozeEmbed
